arts.ttl: Brighton defender Tariq Lamptey set to join Ajax with forward Chuba Akpom poised to leave the Dutch club for Lille
arts.sum: JOE BERNSTEIN: The Dutch giants are ready to pay a cut price £1.5million for 24-year-old Lamptey with the pacey full-back out of contract this summer.
